welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
# Welcome! Welcome to the paste.gg documentation. ## About paste.gg is a [Node.js](https://nodejs.org) module that allows you to easily interact with the [Paste.gg API](https://paste.gg). • Strongly typed • Easy to use • Well maintained • Everyone is allowed to contribute ## Installation **Node.js 12.0.0 or newer is required.** NPM: `npm install paste.gg` or `npm i paste.gg`
Yarn: `yarn add paste.gg` ## Note I am not the original creator of these docs, they are owned by [discord.js](https://github.com/discordjs) team. I decided to use them as they are open source, and I find that lots of people like how easy it is to navigate through these.

classes.name: PasteGG
classes.description: The main class for interacting with the Paste.gg API

construct.name: PasteGG
construct.description: Create a new instance of PasteGG

props.name: options
props.description: The options for the paste server

props.name: version
props.description: The version of the API wrapper

methods.name: headers
methods.description: The headers required for the request

params.name: full
params.description: Includes the contents of files if true.

params.name: input
params.description: The information to create the paste with.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the paste to delete.

params.name: key
params.description: Auth key or deletion key (leave blank if you have set the auth key in the constructor)

params.name: id
params.description: The ID for the paste to update.

params.name: options
params.description: The options you wish to update.

props.description: The request content type

props.description: Authorization for the request

props.description: The base URL of the API

props.description: The URL of the main website

props.name: version
props.description: The version of the API

props.description: The ID of the created paste

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the created paste

props.description: The URL for the result

props.description: The date when the paste expires

props.description: The files used in the created paste

props.name: error

props.description: The error message

props.name: name

props.name: description

props.name: visibility
props.description: The visibility of the paste

props.name: expires
props.description: The expiration date of the paste (must be a UTC ISO 8601 string)

props.name: files
props.description: Array of files to add to the paste (at least one file)

props.name: name
props.description: The new name of the post

props.description: The ID of the file

props.description: The syntax highlighting language used

props.name: highlight_language
props.description: The syntax highlighting language to use

props.description: The value of the file contents

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the file

props.description: The content of the file
